mapper.select: SELECT fk.`name` fee_key_name, fv.`name`, fv.unit FROM apartment_fee_value afv LEFT JOIN fee_value fv ON afv.fee_value_id=fv.id AND fv.is_deleted=0 LEFT JOIN fee_key fk ON fv.fee_key_id=fk.id AND fk.is_deleted=0 WHERE afv.apartment_id=( SELECT apartment_id FROM room_info WHERE id=#{roomId} ) AND afv.is_deleted=0
